data.name: Pages_Question_OrderProgress
data.value: Order progress

data.name: Pages_Question_OrderSuccessTitle
data.value: ◎ Is the order successful

data.name: Pages_Question_OrderSuccessMsg
data.value: When an order is made, the system will send you an Order Confirmation email to confirm the information of the order, including its details and recipient information.

data.name: Pages_Question_OrderProgressTitle
data.value: ◎ How do I track the order progress

data.name: Pages_Question_OrderProgressMsg
data.value: You can search the delivery progress of an item in "My Account>Order Search."

data.name: Pages_Question_OrderCancelTitle
data.value: ◎ How do I cancel an order

data.name: Pages_Question_OrderCancelMsg
data.value: Before an item is shipped, you can go to "My Account>Order Search" and click "Cancel Order."

data.name: Pages_Question_ReturnsOrRefundInstructions
data.value: Return/exchange/refund instructions

data.name: Pages_Question_ReturnsProductTitle
data.value: ◎ Return/exchange instructions

data.name: Pages_Question_ReturnsProductMsg
data.value: Please read "Shopping instructions>Return/exchange instructions."

data.name: Pages_Question_RefundInstructionsTitle
data.value: ◎ Refund: The refund method will be the same as your payment method

data.name: Pages_Question_RefundCreditCardMsg
data.value: Credit card: if you used credit card to pay, we will return the payment to the account of the credit card you used to pay.

data.name: Pages_Question_RefundSuperPickupMsg
data.value: Convenience store/supermarket pickup payment: If you used the convenience store/supermarket pickup payment, please write the correct refund account information on your return request according to the return/refund page. Once the shop has confirmed the return, we will give you your refund to your account within 7 business days.

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponNotes
data.value: About coupons

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponTitle
data.value: ◎ My Coupons

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponMsg
data.value: Go to "My Account>My Coupons" to search coupons or enter coupon codes.

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponUseTitle
data.value: ◎ How to use coupons

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponUseMsg
data.value: When you're checking out, click use coupons or enter coupon codes to get discounts!

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponRuleTitle
data.value: ◎ Rules for using coupons

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponRuleOne
data.value: 1. Only one couple allowed for each shop, each time you check out.

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponRuleTow
data.value: 2. No more than 30% discount of total purchase amount is allowed.

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponRuleThree
data.value: 3. If an item is marked as "Coupons not applicable," you can't use coupons on it.

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponRuleFour
data.value: 4. Coupons can be used only once and should not be used as cash, once used they cannot be restored.

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponRuleFive
data.value: 5. When an order is cancelled or returned, the coupons used on it will become invalid and will not be returned to you.

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponRuleSix
data.value: 6. Coupons expire, and when they do they can no longer be used or restored.

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponRuleSeven
data.value: 7. Coupons can't be used on shipping.

data.name: Pages_Question_ECouponRuleEight
data.value: 8. Coupons are compatible with other discounts in the shop.

data.name: Pages_Question_ElectronicInvoiceDescription
data.value: E-invoice instructions

data.name: Pages_Question_NotElectronicInvoiceTitle
data.value: ◎ Why didn't I receive my invoice?

data.name: Pages_Question_NotElectronicInvoiceMsg
data.value: According to Decree No. 1020002795, the Implementation Guidelines of E-invoices, issued by the Ministry of Finance, effective since January 1, 2014, E-invoices issued by our website do not come in physical form so we won't send you any. We do upload the E-invoices to the E-invoice Platform, Ministry of Finance within a certain period of time. You can go to Member area>Customer service/FAQ>E-invoice return to have it returned to your carrier. Winning invoices that are returned will be notified by the E-invoice Platform, Ministry of Finance to collect the prize; Winning invoices that are not returned will be notified by us via emails and text messages, and we will ask for your address to mail them to you. (For details on E-invoices and member carriers, please visit the E-invoice Platform, Ministry of Finance https://www.einvoice.nat.gov.tw/)

data.name: Pages_Question_GetElectronicInvoiceTitle
data.value: ◎ How do I get physical invoices?

data.name: Pages_Question_GetElectronicInvoiceMsg
data.value: If you want the E-invoice certificate please go to "Order search>Click the order details>Invoice,"read the E-invoice instructions and write your recipient information. The customer service will work on it right away.Reminder: After you have picked up your item you can go to "Order sear>Click the order details>Invoice" to search your E-invoice.

data.name: Pages_Question_WriteElectronicInvoiceTitle
data.value: ◎ Can I get the invoice with Unified Business No./title? When do I get it?

data.name: Pages_Question_WriteElectronicInvoiceMsg
data.value: Invoice with Unified Business No./title will be sent 10 days after the item was shipped.

data.name: Pages_Question_SentElectronicInvoiceTitle
data.value: ◎ What do you do with donated invoices?

data.name: Pages_Question_SentElectronicInvoiceMsg
data.value: According to Article 20 of Decree No. 1020002795, the Implementation Guidelines of E-invoices, that once every two months, the E-invoice Platform, Ministry of Finance should reveal the details of the invoice to organization the buyer chose to donate to before the winning numbers are announced, and notify them of the prizes if they have won. Also, according to the law, you can’t ask for physical copies of donated invoices or change whom you donate to. If you request a return or exchange, we will treat the invoice as invalid.

data.name: Pages_Question_UniformNumbersTitle
data.value: What to do when I want to add Unified Business No. for my invoice, or when there is a typo in the Unified Business No./title?

data.name: Pages_Question_UniformNumbersMsg
data.value: If you have not yet received the physical invoice, please go to “Order search>Click the order details you want>Invoice” to find the order, click it and tell customer service your need, we will work on it right away. *Invoices with Unified Business No./titles will be sent to you within 10 days after shipping, the send date will then show up on the order search page. If you have received the physical invoice or that it has already been sent, please fill in the debit note on the back of the invoice with the title or Unified Business No. you want to change and send it to 91mai Accounting Department, at 6F, No. 5, Lane 768, Section 4, Bade Rd, Nangang District, Taipei City, 115, within 3 days. We will issue another invoice for you. Reminder, the new invoice will have a new number, and its issue month might change too. Sorry for the inconvenience.

data.name: Pages_Question_HowUniformNumbersTitle
data.value: ◎ How do I know the invoice number?

data.name: Pages_Question_HowUniformNumbersMsg
data.value: An invoice is issued right after the payment is made and item is shipped. You can go to “Order search>Click the order details you want>Invoice” anytime to search for your invoice number. If you chose to donate the invoice when you made your order, the last 3 digits of the donated invoice number will be displayed in asterix(*) to protect the rights and interests of the recipient.

data.name: Pages_Question_WhenInvoiceAwardTitle
data.value: ◎ When will you check my invoice to see if I have won?

data.name: Pages_Question_WhenInvoiceAwardMsg
data.value: On the 25th of every odd-numbered month, the E-invoice platform, Ministry of Finance will do all the checking, and on the 28th, when we receive the winning numbers from them, the information will be shown on the Order search page, Invoice.

data.name: Pages_Question_HowInvoiceAwardTitle
data.value: ◎ How do I know whether or not my invoice has won?

data.name: Pages_Question_HowInvoiceAwardMsgOne
data.value: On the 25th of every odd-numbered month, the E-invoice platform, Ministry of Finance will do all the checking, and on the 28th, when we receive the winning numbers from them, the information will be shown on the Order search page, Invoice. Notification method will depend on invoice carrier type and carrier returning status, as follows:

data.name: Pages_Question_HowInvoiceAwardMsgTwo
data.value: Using “Mobile barcode carrier” or “Natural person credential carrier,” the winning invoices will be notified by the E-invoice Platform, Ministry of Finance, to receive the prize.

data.name: Pages_Question_HowInvoiceAwardMsgThree
data.value: Use Member CarrierInvoice carrier has been returned: Winning numbers will be announced on the E-invoice Platform, Ministry of Finance. Invoice carrier not yet returned: Winners will be informed by us after the E-invoice Platform, Ministry of Finance has announced the winning numbers on the 28th of every odd numbered month. We will ask for your address through email and text message, then send the winning invoice to you by mail.

data.name: Pages_Question_NotInvoiceAwardTitle
data.value: ◎ Will I get the invoices back if they didn't win?

data.name: Pages_Question_NotInvoiceAwardMsg
data.value: According to Decree No. 1020002795, the Implementation Guidelines of E-invoices, issued by the Ministry of Finance, we don't proactively send invoices to our customers, but we have to upload them to the integrated service platform within a certain period of time, so you can still search your purchase history on the E-invoice Platform, Ministry of Finance.

data.name: Pages_Question_CanInvoiceGiftTitle
data.value: ◎ Can I donate my invoice?

data.name: Pages_Question_CanInvoiceGiftMsg
data.value: We are sorry! If you didn't choose to donate your invoice when you make your purchase, you can't change it now

data.name: Pages_Question_DateOpeningTitle
data.value: ◎ Can I choose the issue date of the invoice, change the name of the item or its price?

data.name: Pages_Question_DateOpeningMsg
data.value: We are sorry! The invoice for your order is printed by the system automatically. The name and price of the item will stay the way it is, so please understand that you can't choose the date, change the name or price.

data.name: Pages_Question_SmallReminder

data.name: Pages_Question_CompliteMembersHouseholdsMsg
data.value: Once returned, you can immediately search all invoices of this membership card on the E-invoice Platform.

data.name: Pages_Question_CompliteMembersHouseholdsMsgOne
data.value: Details of returned e-invoices can still be searched on our website

data.name: Pages_Question_HomeInquiryMsg
data.value: Winning invoices that are returned will be notified by the Financial Data Center, not by us.
